extends java.lang.Object

      Add a song to the playlist

      post: Returns true if the song was added to the playlist, false if not
      void changeDuration()
      Change the duration of a playlist based on the songs it has
      pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the playlist
      post: Based on the songs in the playlist, the duration of the playlist is changed.

      Checks the existence of a genre in the playlist songs
      pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the playlist
      post: Returns true if the the indicated genre exists, false if it doesn't
      java.lang.String getBasicInformation()
      Returns the basic information of the playlist
      pre:
      post: Based on the information that all playlists must have, a string with all the basic information is obtained

      Indicates what genres the playlist has depending on the songs it contains

      Checks the existence of a song in the playlist

      • getPlaylistName

      • setPlaylistName

        public void setPlaylistName(java.lang.String playlistName)
        Parameters:
        playlistName - String that indicates the name of the playlist. playlistName cannot contain spaces

      • checkGenreExistence

        public boolean checkGenreExistence(int genreIndicator)
        Checks the existence of a genre in the playlist songs
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the playlist
        post: Returns true if the the indicated genre exists, false if it doesn't
        Parameters:
        genreIndicator - Integer number representing one of the possible genres for songs. 1 <= genreIndicator <= 7
        Returns:
        true or false

      • putGenres

        public java.lang.String putGenres()
        Indicates what genres the playlist has depending on the songs it contains
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the playlist
        post: A string containing the genres of the playlist is obtained
        Returns:
        info

      • changeDuration

        public void changeDuration()
        Change the duration of a playlist based on the songs it has
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the playlist
        post: Based on the songs in the playlist, the duration of the playlist is changed.

      • getBasicInformation

        public java.lang.String getBasicInformation()
        Returns the basic information of the playlist
        pre:
        post: Based on the information that all playlists must have, a string with all the basic information is obtained
        Returns:
        info

      • songExists

        public boolean songExists(Song poolSong)
        Checks the existence of a song in the playlist
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one song in the playlist.
        post: Returns true if the the indicated song exists, false if it doesn't
        Parameters:
        poolSong - A Song, it must be one from the pool of songs of the MCS
        Returns:
        true or false
